title: $:/litClock/times/-23:00-Italo Calvino
quote_first: He says, “They’ve killed Jan. Clear out.” “The suitcase?” I ask. “Take it away again. We want nothing to do with it now. Catch the
quote_last: express.” “But it doesn’t stop here….” “It will. Go to track six. Opposite the freight station. You have three minutes.” “But…” “Move, or I’ll have to arrest you."

title: $:/litClock/times/-23:00-Charlotte Brontë
